00033 DiagramPort::DiagramPort(QSharedPointer<BusInterface> busIf, LibraryInterface* lh,
00034                          QGraphicsItem *parent) : DiagramConnectionEndPoint(parent),
00035                                                   temp_(!busIf->getBusType().isValid()), lh_(lh),
00036                                                   oldPos_(), oldPortPositions_()
00037 {
00038 
00039     Q_ASSERT_X(busIf, "DiagramPort constructor",
00040         "Null BusInterface pointer given as parameter");
00041 
00042     busInterface_ = busIf;
00043 
00044     int squareSize = GridSize;
00045     /*  /\
00046      *  ||
00047      */
00048     QPolygonF shape;
00049     shape << QPointF(-squareSize/2, squareSize/2)
00050           << QPointF(-squareSize/2, .0)
00051           << QPointF(0, -squareSize/2)
00052           << QPointF(squareSize/2, 0)
00053           << QPointF(squareSize/2, squareSize/2);
00054     setPolygon(shape);
00055 
00056     nameLabel_ = new QGraphicsTextItem("", this);
00057     QFont font = nameLabel_->font();
00058     font.setPointSize(8);
00059     nameLabel_->setFont(font);
00060     nameLabel_->setFlag(ItemIgnoresTransformations);
00061     nameLabel_->setFlag(ItemStacksBehindParent);
00062     QGraphicsDropShadowEffect *shadow = new QGraphicsDropShadowEffect;
00063     shadow->setXOffset(0);
00064     shadow->setYOffset(0);
00065     shadow->setBlurRadius(5);
00066     nameLabel_->setGraphicsEffect(shadow);
00067 
00068     setFlag(ItemIsMovable);
00069     setFlag(ItemIsSelectable);
00070     setFlag(ItemSendsGeometryChanges);
00071     setFlag(ItemSendsScenePositionChanges);
00072 
00073     updateInterface();
00074 }

00102 void DiagramPort::updateInterface()
00103 {
00104     // Set the port black if it is temporary.
00105     if (!busInterface_->getBusType().isValid())
00106     {
00107         setBrush(QBrush(Qt::black));
00108     }
00109     else
00110     {
00111         // Otherwise set the color based on the interface mode.
00112         switch (busInterface_->getInterfaceMode()) {
00113         case General::MASTER:
00114             setBrush(QBrush(QColor(0x32,0xcb,0xcb)));
00115             break;
00116         case General::SLAVE:
00117             setBrush(QBrush(QColor(0x32,0x99,0x64)));
00118             break;
00119         case General::MIRROREDMASTER:
00120             setBrush(QBrush(QColor(0xcb,0xfd,0xfd)));
00121             break;
00122         case General::MIRROREDSLAVE:
00123             setBrush(QBrush(QColor(0x00,0xfd,00)));
00124             break;
00125         case General::SYSTEM:
00126             setBrush(QBrush(QColor(0xf9,0x11,0x11)));
00127             break;
00128         case General::MIRROREDSYSTEM:
00129             setBrush(QBrush(QColor(0xf9,0x9d,0xcb)));
00130             break;
00131         case General::MONITOR:
00132             setBrush(QBrush(QColor(0xfd,0xfd,0xfd)));
00133             break;
00134         }
00135     }
00136 
00137     nameLabel_->setHtml("<div style=\"background-color:#eeeeee; padding:10px 10px;\">"
00138                         +busInterface_->getName().left(15)+"</div>");
00139 
00140     qreal nameWidth = nameLabel_->boundingRect().width();
00141     qreal nameHeight = nameLabel_->boundingRect().height();
00142 
00143     if (pos().x() < 0)
00144     {
00145         nameLabel_->setPos(nameHeight/2, GridSize/2);
00146     }
00147     else
00148     {
00149         nameLabel_->setPos(-nameHeight/2, GridSize/2 + nameWidth);
00150     }
00151 
00152     emit contentChanged();
00153 }

00155 bool DiagramPort::isHierarchical() const
00156 {
00157     return false;

00160 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00161 // Function: onConnect()
00162 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00163 bool DiagramPort::onConnect(DiagramConnectionEndPoint const* other)
00164 {
00165     QSharedPointer<BusInterface> otherBusIf = other->getBusInterface();
00166 
00167     // If the port is a temporary one, try to copy the configuration from the other end point.
00168     if (temp_ && otherBusIf != 0 && otherBusIf->getBusType().isValid())
00169     {
00170         if (!static_cast<BlockDiagram*>(scene())->getEditProvider().isPerformingUndoRedo())
00171         {
00172             // Set a compatible interface mode. If the other end point is a hierarchical one,
00173             // the same interface mode injects automatically. Otherwise the proper interface mode must
00174             // be determined/asked based on the other bus interface.
00175             General::InterfaceMode mode = otherBusIf->getInterfaceMode();
00176            
00177             if (!other->isHierarchical())
00178             {
00179                 if (!askCompatibleMode(otherBusIf, mode))
00180                 {
00181                     return false;
00182                 }
00183             }
00184 
00185             busInterface_->setInterfaceMode(mode);
00186         }
00187 
00188         // Copy the bus and abstraction definitions.
00189         busInterface_->setBusType(otherBusIf->getBusType());
00190         busInterface_->setAbstractionType(otherBusIf->getAbstractionType());
00191         updateInterface();
00192     }
00193 
00194     return true;
00195 }
00196 
00197 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00198 // Function: onDisonnect()
00199 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00200 void DiagramPort::onDisconnect(DiagramConnectionEndPoint const*)
00201 {
00202     // If the port is a temporary one, set the bus and abstraction definitions undefined.
00203     if (temp_)
00204     {
00205         busInterface_->setBusType(VLNV());
00206         busInterface_->setAbstractionType(VLNV());
00207         updateInterface();
00208     }
00209 }
00210 
00211 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00212 // Function: canConnect()
00213 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00214 bool DiagramPort::canConnect(DiagramConnectionEndPoint const* other) const
00215 {
00216     QSharedPointer<BusInterface> otherBusIf = other->getBusInterface();
00217 
00218     // If the other end point is hierarchical, we can connect to it if the interface mode
00219     // is the same or either of the end point is undefined.
00220     if (other->isHierarchical())
00221     {
00222         return (other->getBusInterface()->getInterfaceMode() == General::MODE_UNDEFINED ||
00223                 !busInterface_->getBusType().isValid() ||
00224                 other->getBusInterface()->getInterfaceMode() == busInterface_->getInterfaceMode());
00225     }
00226     // If only one port has a bus definition defined at most, then the end points can be connected.
00227     else if (!(busInterface_->getBusType().isValid() && otherBusIf->getBusType().isValid()))
00228     {
00229         return true;
00230     }
00231     // Otherwise make sure that the bus and abstraction definitions are of the same type.
00232     else if (otherBusIf->getBusType() == busInterface_->getBusType() &&
00233              otherBusIf->getAbstractionType() == busInterface_->getAbstractionType())
00234     {
00235         General::InterfaceMode myMode = busInterface_->getInterfaceMode();
00236         General::InterfaceMode otherMode = otherBusIf->getInterfaceMode();
00237 
00238         if (myMode == General::MASTER) {
00239             if (otherMode == General::SLAVE || otherMode == General::MIRROREDMASTER) {
00240                 return true;
00241             }
00242         } else if (myMode == General::SLAVE) {
00243 
00244             if (otherMode == General::MASTER || otherMode == General::MIRROREDSLAVE) {
00245                 return true;
00246             }
00247         } else if (myMode == General::MIRROREDMASTER && otherMode == General::MASTER) {
00248             return true;
00249         } else if (myMode == General::MIRROREDSLAVE && otherMode == General::SLAVE) {
00250             return true;
00251         } else if (myMode == General::SYSTEM || otherMode == General::SYSTEM) {
00252             return true;
00253         }
00254     }
00255 
00256     return false;
00257 }

00260 {
00261     return qgraphicsitem_cast<DiagramComponent *>(parentItem());

00264 QSharedPointer<Component> DiagramPort::ownerComponent() const {
00265         DiagramComponent* comp = encompassingComp();
00266         Q_ASSERT(comp);
00267         QSharedPointer<Component> compModel = comp->componentModel();
00268         Q_ASSERT(compModel);
00269         return compModel;
00270 }

00272 QVariant DiagramPort::itemChange(GraphicsItemChange change,
00273                                  const QVariant &value)
00274 {
00275     switch (change) {
00276 
00277     case ItemPositionChange:
00278         {
00279             if (!parentItem())
00280             {
00281                 return snapPointToGrid(value.toPointF());
00282             }
00283 
00284             QPointF pos = value.toPointF();
00285             QRectF parentRect = qgraphicsitem_cast<DiagramComponent *>(parentItem())->rect();
00286 
00287             if (pos.x() < 0)
00288             {
00289                 pos.setX(parentRect.left());
00290             }
00291             else
00292             {
00293                 pos.setX(parentRect.right());
00294             }
00295 
00296             return snapPointToGrid(pos);
00297         }
00298 
00299     case ItemPositionHasChanged:
00300         {
00301             if (!parentItem())
00302                 break;
00303 
00304             qreal nameWidth = nameLabel_->boundingRect().width();
00305             qreal nameHeight = nameLabel_->boundingRect().height();
00306 
00307             QRectF parentRect = qgraphicsitem_cast<DiagramComponent *>(parentItem())->rect();
00308 
00309             // Check if the port is directed to the left.
00310             if (pos().x() < 0)
00311             {
00312                 setDirection(QVector2D(-1.0f, 0.0f));
00313                 nameLabel_->setPos(nameHeight/2, GridSize/2);
00314             }
00315             // Otherwise the port is directed to the right.
00316             else
00317             {
00318                 setDirection(QVector2D(1.0f, 0.0f));
00319                 nameLabel_->setPos(-nameHeight/2, GridSize/2 + nameWidth);
00320             }
00321 
00322             emit contentChanged();
00323             break;
00324         }
00325 
00326     case ItemScenePositionHasChanged:
00327         // Check if the updates are not disabled.
00328         if (!static_cast<DiagramComponent*>(parentItem())->isConnectionUpdateDisabled())
00329         {
00330             // Update the connections.
00331             foreach (DiagramInterconnection *interconnection, getInterconnections())
00332             {
00333                 interconnection->updatePosition();
00334             }
00335         }
00336 
00337         break;
00338 
00339     default:
00340         break;
00341     }
00342 
00343     return QGraphicsItem::itemChange(change, value);
00344 }

00354 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00355 // Function: mouseMoveEvent()
00356 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00357 void DiagramPort::mouseMoveEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent *event)
00358 {
00359     // Discard mouse move if the diagram is protected.
00360     if (static_cast<BlockDiagram*>(scene())->isProtected())
00361     {
00362         return;
00363     }
00364 
00365     DiagramConnectionEndPoint::mouseMoveEvent(event);
00366     encompassingComp()->onMovePort(this);
00367 }

00369 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00370 // Function: setTypes()
00371 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00372 void DiagramPort::setTypes(VLNV const& busType, VLNV const& absType, General::InterfaceMode mode)
00373 {
00374     Q_ASSERT(busInterface_ != 0);
00375 
00376     // If the bus interface was already defined, disconnect the connections before making any updates.
00377     if (busInterface_->getBusType().isValid())
00378     {
00379         foreach(DiagramInterconnection* conn, getInterconnections())
00380         {
00381             if (conn->endPoint1() != this)
00382             {
00383                 conn->endPoint1()->removeInterconnection(conn);
00384                 conn->endPoint1()->onDisconnect(this);
00385                 conn->endPoint1()->addInterconnection(conn);
00386             }
00387             else
00388             {
00389                 conn->endPoint2()->removeInterconnection(conn);
00390                 conn->endPoint2()->onDisconnect(this);
00391                 conn->endPoint2()->addInterconnection(conn);
00392             }
00393         }
00394     }
00395 
00396     // Initialize the bus interface.
00397     busInterface_->setBusType(busType);
00398     busInterface_->setAbstractionType(absType);
00399     busInterface_->setInterfaceMode(mode);
00400 
00401     // Update the interface visuals.
00402     setTemporary(!busType.isValid());
00403     updateInterface();
00404 
00405     if (busType.isValid())
00406     {
00407         // Undefined end points of the connections can now be defined.
00408         foreach(DiagramInterconnection* conn, getInterconnections())
00409         {
00410             if (conn->endPoint1() != this)
00411             {
00412                 conn->endPoint1()->onConnect(this);
00413                 conn->endPoint2()->onConnect(conn->endPoint1());
00414             }
00415             else
00416             {
00417                 conn->endPoint2()->onConnect(this);
00418                 conn->endPoint1()->onConnect(conn->endPoint2());
00419             }
00420         }
00421     }
00422 }

00424 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00425 // Function: mousePressEvent()
00426 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00427 void DiagramPort::mousePressEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent *event)
00428 {
00429     DiagramConnectionEndPoint::mousePressEvent(event);    
00430     oldPos_ = pos();
00431 
00432     // Save old port positions for all ports in the parent component.
00433     foreach (QGraphicsItem* item, parentItem()->childItems())
00434     {
00435         if (item->type() == DiagramPort::Type && item != this)
00436         {
00437             DiagramPort* port = static_cast<DiagramPort*>(item);
00438             oldPortPositions_.insert(port, port->pos());
00439         }
00440     }
00441 
00442     // Begin the position update for the connections.
00443     foreach (DiagramInterconnection* conn, getInterconnections())
00444     {
00445         conn->beginUpdatePosition();
00446     }
00447 }
00448 
00449 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00450 // Function: mouseReleaseEvent()
00451 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00452 void DiagramPort::mouseReleaseEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent *event)
00453 {
00454     DiagramConnectionEndPoint::mouseReleaseEvent(event);
00455 
00456     QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand> cmd;
00457 
00458     // Check if the port position was really changed.
00459     if (oldPos_ != pos())
00460     {
00461         cmd = QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand>(new PortMoveCommand(this, oldPos_));
00462     }
00463     else
00464     {
00465         cmd = QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand>(new QUndoCommand());
00466     }
00467 
00468     // Determine if the other ports changed their position and create undo commands for them.
00469     QMap<DiagramPort*, QPointF>::iterator cur = oldPortPositions_.begin();
00470 
00471     while (cur != oldPortPositions_.end())
00472     {
00473         if (cur.key()->pos() != cur.value())
00474         {
00475             QUndoCommand* childCmd = new PortMoveCommand(cur.key(), cur.value(), cmd.data());
00476         }
00477 
00478         ++cur;
00479     }
00480 
00481     oldPortPositions_.clear();
00482     
00483     // End the position update of the connections.
00484     foreach (DiagramInterconnection* conn, getInterconnections())
00485     {
00486         conn->endUpdatePosition(cmd.data());
00487     }
00488 
00489     // Add the undo command to the edit stack only if it has changes.
00490     if (cmd->childCount() > 0 || oldPos_ != pos())
00491     {
00492         static_cast<BlockDiagram*>(scene())->getEditProvider().addCommand(cmd, false);
00493     }
00494 }

00496 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00497 // Function: askCompatibleMode()
00498 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00499 bool DiagramPort::askCompatibleMode(QSharedPointer<BusInterface> otherBusIf,
00500                                     General::InterfaceMode& mode)
00501 {
00502     switch (otherBusIf->getInterfaceMode())
00503     {
00504     case General::MIRROREDMASTER:
00505         {
00506             mode = General::MASTER;
00507             break;
00508         }
00509 
00510     case General::MIRROREDSLAVE:
00511         {
00512             mode = General::SLAVE;
00513             break;
00514         }
00515 
00516     case General::MIRROREDSYSTEM:
00517         {
00518             mode = General::SYSTEM;
00519             break;
00520         }
00521 
00522     case General::SYSTEM:
00523         {
00524             mode = General::MIRROREDSYSTEM;
00525             break;
00526         }
00527 
00528     case General::MASTER:
00529         {
00530             // Try to determine whether this port should be slave or mirrored-master.
00531             QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = lh_->getModel(otherBusIf->getBusType());
00532             QSharedPointer<BusDefinition> busDef = libComp.dynamicCast<BusDefinition>();
00533 
00534             if (busDef == 0)
00535             {
00536                 return false;
00537             }
00538 
00539             if (!busDef->getDirectConnection())
00540             {
00541                 // This must be a mirrored-master.
00542                 mode = General::MIRROREDMASTER;
00543             }
00544             else
00545             {
00546                 // Ask the user for the correct type.
00547                 setHighlight(HIGHLIGHT_HOVER);
00548 
00549                 BusInterfaceDialog dialog(false, (QWidget*)scene()->parent());
00550                 dialog.addMode(General::MIRROREDMASTER);
00551                 dialog.addMode(General::SLAVE);
00552 
00553                 if (dialog.exec() == QDialog::Rejected)
00554                 {
00555                     setHighlight(HIGHLIGHT_OFF);
00556                     return false;
00557                 }
00558 
00559                 setHighlight(HIGHLIGHT_OFF);
00560 
00561                 mode = dialog.getSelectedMode();
00562             }
00563             break;
00564         }
00565 
00566     case General::SLAVE:
00567         {
00568             // Try to determine whether this port should be slave or mirrored-master.
00569             QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = lh_->getModel(otherBusIf->getBusType());
00570             QSharedPointer<BusDefinition> busDef = libComp.dynamicCast<BusDefinition>();
00571 
00572             if (busDef == 0)
00573             {
00574                 return false;
00575             }
00576 
00577             if (!busDef->getDirectConnection())
00578             {
00579                 // This must be a mirrored-master.
00580                 mode = General::MIRROREDMASTER;
00581             }
00582             else
00583             {
00584                 // Ask the user for the correct type.
00585                 setHighlight(HIGHLIGHT_HOVER);
00586 
00587                 BusInterfaceDialog dialog(false, (QWidget*)scene()->parent());
00588                 dialog.addMode(General::MIRROREDSLAVE);
00589                 dialog.addMode(General::MASTER);
00590 
00591                 if (dialog.exec() == QDialog::Rejected)
00592                 {
00593                     setHighlight(HIGHLIGHT_OFF);
00594                     return false;
00595                 }
00596 
00597                 setHighlight(HIGHLIGHT_OFF);
00598 
00599                 mode = dialog.getSelectedMode();
00600 
00601             }
00602             break;
00603         }
00604 
00605     case General::MONITOR:
00606         {
00607             mode = General::MONITOR;
00608             break;
00609         }
00610     }
00611 
00612     return true;
00613 }
00614 
00615 void DiagramPort::setInterfaceMode( General::InterfaceMode mode ) {
00616         Q_ASSERT(busInterface_);
00617         busInterface_->setInterfaceMode(mode);
00618         updateInterface();
00619 }
